name: shouldShowRowOfColoredCells

testSteps.description: When the word is CRYPT and the guess is ORGAN, the row is GRAY, GREEN, GRAY, GRAY, GRAY  {cell4= GRAY, cell5= GRAY, cell2= GREEN, cell3= GRAY, guess= ORGAN, word=CRYPT, cell1= GRAY}
When the word is CRYPT and the guess is BRACE, the row is GRAY, GREEN, GRAY, YELLOW, GRAY  {cell4= YELLOW, cell5= GRAY, cell2= GREEN, cell3= GRAY, guess= BRACE, word=CRYPT, cell1= GRAY}
When the word is CRYPT and the guess is CRYPT, the row is GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN  {cell4= GREEN, cell5= GREEN, cell2= GREEN, cell3= GREEN, guess= CRYPT, word=CRYPT, cell1= GREEN}
